basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer | Cloud & DevOps | Node.js • Angular • React
basics.summary: Senior full-stack developer and IT professional with expertise in modernizing legacy systems into scalable, cloud-native architectures. Skilled in building APIs, data pipelines, and distributed applications using AWS, Node.js, Angular, GraphQL, and Postgres. Experienced with DevOps practices, CI/CD automation, and event-driven frameworks. Adept at managing cross-functional teams, collaborating with vendors, and delivering secure, efficient solutions that directly impact business outcomes.

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
highlights: Developed and deployed full-stack applications using Java, GWT, PHP, Vue, and PostgreSQL in Dockerized environments
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks to accelerate delivery and reduce defects
Built APIs and data integrations for clients migrating from legacy platforms to modern, event-driven systems
Managed cloud infrastructure with GCP, optimizing costs and ensuring scalability
Designed and executed database migrations, supporting business-critical modernization projects

work.name: Unbound Digital
work.position: Help Desk Manager / IT Project Manager
highlights: Led IT modernization projects including server-to-cloud migrations (Microsoft 365, Azure, Exchange, Teams)
Managed engineering and support teams, overseeing project delivery for 100+ clients
Developed migration frameworks for clients transitioning off legacy platforms to cloud-native systems
Coordinated with vendors, engineers, and stakeholders to ensure successful implementation of new services

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Supported digital workflows with CAD/CAM and clinical software integrations
Optimized IT systems to support medical device workflows and data pipelines
